name: Rebasing TBT
description: The basic properties of our TBT token: - It is a rebasing token. - It is permissionless. - Users can mint TBT with USDC. The minting price will always be $1, if fees are excluded. - Users can redeem TBT for USDC. The redemption price will always be $1, if fees are excluded. REF: https://tprotocol.gitbook.io/tprotocol-documentation/white-paper/tprotocol-documentation/tprotocol-mechanism#introducing-tbt-and-stbt
